contentrichtext.text: '''NiS''' may refer to: *[[Millerite|Nickel sulfide]] '''Nis''' may refer to: * [[NiÅ¡]], a city in south-eastern Serbia * [[Nis, Iran]], a village in Khuzestan Province, Iran * [[Ness, Western Isles]] (Scottish Gaelic: ''Nis''), a village in the Outer Hebrides islands '''NIS''' may refer to: In '''politics''' and '''government''': * [[New Israeli Shekel]], the currency unit of modern Israel * [[Newly Independent States]], the 15 independent states that seceded from the USSR in its dissolution in December 1991 * [[National Intelligence Service (South Korea)]], South Korea's state security agency * [[National Intelligence Service (Greece)]], Greece's national intelligence agency * [[Norwegian Intelligence Service]], Norway's military intelligence agency * [[Naval Investigative Service]], the predecessor of the [[Naval Criminal Investigative Service]] (NCIS) as the U.S. Navy's internal law enforcement branch * [[Statistics Belgium]] (Dutch: ''Nationaal Instituut voor de Statistiek'', French: ''Institut National de Statistique''), the main government statistics office of Belgium * [[Nuclear Information Service]], an organisation that promote debate on nuclear disarmament * [[National Institute of Statistics of Cambodia]], the National statistical agency of Cambodia In '''computing''': * [[Network Information Service]], also known as "Yellow Pages" (YP); a client-server directory service protocol by Sun Microsystems for managing a network * [[Norton Internet Security]], computer security software developed by Symantec Corporation * [[Nippon Ichi Software]], a developer and publisher of video games * [[Network information system]], a system to manage other networks * Network and Information Security, a term extensively used by [[European Network and Information Security Agency]] (ENISA) In '''music''': *[[Johnson (rapper)]], Danish rapper also known as N.I.S. '''Other uses''': * [[Naftna Industrija Srbije]], Petroleum Industry of Serbia * [[National Institute of Sports]], an educational center in India * [[National innovation system]], which examines knowledge production in a firm * [[N-Iodosuccinimide]], a reagent used in organic synthesis and source of electrophilic iodine * [[Sodium-iodide symporter]], found in the thyroid gland * The [[Nanjing International School]], school serving the expatriate community of Nanjing *[[Nishimachi International School]], a private school in Tokyo, Japan * [[Phases_of_clinical_research#Phase_IV|Non-Interventional Study]], a type of clinical research * The [[Ski_binding#Cross_country|Nordic Integrated System]], a type of ski binding in cross-country skiing * The [[Norwegian International Ship Register]], in Norwegian ''Norsk Internasjonalt Skipsregister'' (NIS) {{disambiguation|geo}}
